subject: Drugs worldwide at low price
body:
Dear valued member.
Good news from MyCanadianPharmacy. Spring discounts for all our customers. 
Your health and wellness is the main focus of our professional team and we are glad to offer you really top quality products. 
Click here and your products will be delivered directly to your doorstephttp://showweek.hk
We offer a full range of modern pharmaceutical products.High level of our service will exceed your expectations. 
Yours faithfully,Gerald Chung
